EmailTemplate.description: Sent to office when a Full Award Set-up form is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Office alert when Full Award Set-up Form submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Full Application submitted {!Application__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A full award set-up form has been submitted for the Life Chances Fund. The application ID is {!Application__c.Name}.
Regards Centre for Social Impact Bonds
